synopsis.text:
Masashi, Hiroyuki, Akari, and a host of other vibrant characters navigate the complexities of high school, love, and friendship in this heartfelt anime. Hiroyuki, a seemingly lazy high school student, possesses an innate ability to connect with girls, forming deep friendships with ease. Despite his perpetual sleepiness, he has a kind heart, making him a reliable and beloved friend.

Akari, Hiroyuki's childhood friend, has harbored feelings for him that extend beyond friendship. As they embark on a new semester, their relationship could either deepen or fade away. Sharing their everyday adventures are the tranquil Masashi and the effervescent Shiho, who add their own unique flavors to the group dynamics.

Together, they face the trials and triumphs of high school life, from seating arrangements and clean-up duties to karaoke sessions and supernatural encounters. As Hiroyuki interacts with other students, such as the class president Tomoko and the enigmatic Serika, will he come to realize Akari's affection for him, or will their love story remain unwritten? Join this endearing cast of characters as they explore the intricacies of love, relationships, and friendship in this captivating tale.
